participant_1.name: Liam Carter
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, with a passion for immersive storytelling.
participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Margaret Steele
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and creative, with a flair for the dramatic and a desire for control.
participant_2.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i have two grown children who never visit.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

my daughter is a child prodigy.
i am a doctor.
my favorite movie is friday.
i enjoy going to the park.
i am now looking for a new job.
